txt.en: 'Greetings, good [placeholder]! Pull up a bench and tell us your tale!.'
'Mind you stay away from those ruins up on the hill. There's been rumours of wolves roaming around up there.'
Gammy Boggs makes the best raspberry tarts. I wish she'd come to the party!'
'I tell you that Ferumbras Attereeve's a few chickens short of a coop! Really, selling spiders to children....'
